title: AHOYBRAUSE
author: AHOYBRAUSE
created_time: August 05, 2023, 09:59:35 AMLast edit: August 06, 2023, 04:41:33 AM by AHOYBRAUSE
content: I didn't know this story about an ex bitcointalk member mb300sd, I guess plenty or at least some of you do.Thats him -> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=36986But for those who don't I can only advise you to watch this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pxvd1YOMGxU . This video is just a month old and shows the impressive story of Jimmy Zhong, an early bitcoin adapter that made billions and everything got taken from him in court. Also he stole a lot of coins from silk road   .It's also a great video about bitcoin in general, as well as security while mixing and so on. Everybody that uses or is interested in bitcoin it's an interesting watch I think.

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: This is such an interesting story related to Bitcoin! The documentary lasts for a full 30 minutes and surprises me with how clever Jimmy is. I feel sorry for him because the government took advantage of him and confiscated all his coins, leaving him with nothing. His biggest mistake was not being cautious. He also committed a crime by looting large amount of Bitcoin from the silkroad company though. For everyone, his story will serve as an example for those who think they can get away with illegal activities any continue to hide under the sun. Let's not forget, as the saying goes, "Many days for the thief, but one day for the owner." Let's all stay away from illegal cyber activities.

James Zhong had all his stolen BTC's confiscated, however, he was sentenced to only a year and a day in prison for the crime.

comments.body: Bullied as he was, Jimmy Zhong should have been one of the few powerful figures in the world and market of cryptocurrency has he aligned with people like CZ and Buterin. comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: It is one thing to steal loads of coins and thinking that you can hide forever, but Jimmy Zhong found this out the hard way. The illegal gains will give you joy for a little while, until the hand of the law catch up to you. I work hard to earn my "coins" and I can sleep like a baby.... but people like Jimmy Zhong sleep with one eye open. He constantly worried about the law catching up to him.... and it eventually happened.

There's some famous instances of retired darknet market admins that never got busted, even though they made their fortune in BTC which as we all know is quite traceable.
